The Puma store at VivoCity is a fantastic spot for quality sportswear and stylish casual wear. The store is well-organized, making it easy to browse through their collection of shoes, apparel, and accessories.

The staff are friendly, knowledgeable, and always ready to help with recommendations or sizing. Prices are reasonable, and there are often great deals or promotions available.

A must-visit for anyone looking for trendy and functional sports gear in Singaporeâ€™s largest mall!

I was here to try the deviate nitro 3 after hearing all the good things about it from my friends.

The sales person nick was very helpful and knowledge in assisting me with this particular model.

He tried really hard to make it work for me but in the end I did not buy as it wasn't really suitable for my troublesome feet. I really appreciate him for his professionalism.

I also appreciate that the store opened earlier than the advertised 10. 30am.

Hi I just went to bought 2 shoes today for my mom and my daughter and it was a amazing experience to shop with the staffs there  were all incredibly helpful,friendly ,knowledgeable about the product they representing .
Above that I wish to highlight on one of the staff by the name of LOUIS ,he was amazingly helpful my mom was wheelchair bound and he patiently assist her with patience explaining the detail and even to my daughter his knowledge of the brand  was superb and honest in his recomendation.
KUDOS PUMA VIVO CITY

The customer service was excellent. My time at Puma VivoCity was convenient. I was able to buy a pair conveniently and unforced. The store also offered a variety of unique designs. I will go back when I visit Singapore again in the future.

I went looking for a shoe at Vivo and decided to buy from Puma due to great service from Louis. He was patient in explaining the differences between the models, answering my questions and getting different sizes. He also told me about the available promos to help me get more value from my purchase.
